jd: From: Khursheed, RHG responseph@resourcehuntgroup.com Reply to: responseph@resourcehuntgroup.com Hi All,Hope all are doing well.Senior AWS Engineer Person should be available to work in person from New Jersey, USNeed Local to NJ CandidatesTen (10) years of professional work related to software development and implementation and for the last 2 working on cloud-based platforms (AWS), preferably in Financial Services.Certifications:AWS Certified Developer – Associate or above• Skills:o Demonstrable experience of implementing enterprise data solutionso Hands-on development skills in Python, Java in that order of priorityo Understanding of core AWS services uses, and basic AWS architecture best practiceso Proficiency in developing, deploying, and debugging cloud-based applications using AWSo Experience in integrating Vendor products using Application APIs.Thanks & Regards,Khursheed
